entry.title: Luxury St. Patrick's Day Card 'St. Patrick's Bouquet'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: St Patricks Day Cards
Price: 19.95

A really special card for St. Patrick's Day. Presented in luxurious gift box it will make a ly impressive keepsake. The design boasts a lovely green bouquet made from large and small ribbon roses, silk petals and satin ribbons. The whole arrangement is mounted to the green shamrock frame and handcrafted with crystals, rhinestuds and large green satin ribbon bow.

This St. Patrick's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury St. Patrick's Day Card 'Lucky Shamrock'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: St Patricks Day Cards
Price: 16.50

Four leaf shamrock with a lots of green - that's the only thing you need to wish someone Good Luck and Very Happy St. Patrick's Day. The design boast green clover created from four die-cut green paper hearts and cascade of little shamrocks down the front. The whole arrangement is gorgeously handcrafted with stones, beads and emerald and ivory satin ribbons.

This St. Patrick's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury St. Patrick's Day Card 'St. Patrick's Day'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: St Patricks Day Cards
Price: 16.50

St Patrick's Day is all about green. That's why we think this card will be just perfect to wish your friends or family a Happy St. Patrick's Day. The main feature of the design is a watercolour print with lots of layers of green and ivory ribbons running across. And lovely round green shamrock badge with crystals completes this gorgeous card.

This St. Patrick's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury St. Patrick's Day Card 'Stay Lucky'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: St Patricks Day Cards
Price: 16.75

Shamrock is a symbol of luck and this gorgeous St. Patricks Day card will for sure make any person feel like they have got a true luck of the Irish. The design features shamrock created from four die-cut green paper hearts on foam pads and embellished with crystals, rhinestones, gold metallic hearts and green flower shell bead.

This St. Patrick's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.
